channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-20659] YARNSessionCapacitySchedulerITCase.perJobYarnClusterOffHeap test failed with NPE

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
I tried to reproduce on AzureCI but didn't succeed with looping over the test. The I figured that there's FLINK-15534 already addressing the same issue for another YARN test. The conclusion is that it's based on YARN-7007 which would require use to upgrade the hadoop version used in the Yarn tests to 2.8.6 which includes the fix for that issue.

chesnay I guess we would still not upgrade the hadoop version since the test case is rarely failing? I would go ahead with closing the issue in that case.
Some additional documentation for FLINK-15534 and running yarn tests in general merged to master in 3436381117ef8fb21f7e02ef63d6d6ec07792203.
